mapper.select: select no, name, content, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') regDate from guestbook order by regDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook values( SEQ_GUESTBOOK_NO.nextval, #{name}, #{password}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where no = #{no} and password = #{password}
